org.hypergraphdb.viewer

Class GraphViewU

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hypergraphdb.viewer.GraphViewU

  • public class GraphViewU
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility operations for selection and hiding/unhiding nodes and edges in a GraphView. Most operations are self-explanatory.
